pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'shiny' Cron Expression Input Widget // A widget for 'shiny' apps to handle schedule expression input, using the 'cron- expression-input' JavaScript component. Note that this does not edit the 'crontab' file, it is just an input element for the schedules. See https://github.com/DatalabFabriek/shinycronedito r/blob/main/inst/examples/shiny-app.R for an example implementation.
